div.div: Press the "Start" button to move to the next frame

div.div:
The "Header" shrinks and the "Start" button disappears.
The user is presented with the main content

div.div:
User is presented with the alphabet.
The letters are coloured red if the user made a wrong guess, and green for the correct guess
